TITLE: Memorial Day: 6 American heroes who gave their lives fighting for freedom
SUMMARY: For Memorial Day, find time to honor these six Americans, and the many others, who sacrificed their lives so the United States could stay a free country.

TITLE: Louisiana State Police release body cam footage of Ronald Greene's deadly arrest
SUMMARY: Louisiana authorities released a 46-minute long body-camera video Friday showing the 2019 deadly encounter between Ronald Greene and state troopers as they dragged and used a stun gun on him following a vehicle chase.

TITLE: Labor Day meaning: A brief history of the holiday and why we celebrate
SUMMARY: Labor Day marks the end of summer, and many workers are able to celebrate with a three-day weekend. The weekend is typically filled with travel, retail sales and parties.

TITLE: Yes, you can wear white after Labor Day: Fashion experts weigh in
SUMMARY: While there are many fashion "rules," it all comes down to style and preference. One of the biggest rules is not wearing white after Labor Day, which is an outdated idea.

TITLE: Razor blades and poisoned candy: A history of Americans fearing Halloween
SUMMARY: Warnings against tainted Halloween candy have been around for decades, but there's little to no evidence to substantiate the rumor. Here's how the myth might've gotten started.

TITLE: 9 ways you can save big as the host of Thanksgiving dinner
SUMMARY: Thanksgiving inflation is here, but that doesn't mean you have to spend big bucks on your favorite holiday staples. Here are nine tips for smart hosting this season.

TITLE: Simplify your Thanksgiving spread with these 1-pan side dish delights
SUMMARY: Simplify your Thanksgiving kitchen cleanup this year with three unforgettable one-pan recipes, ensuring a memorable holiday season and delicious food without all the fuss.

TITLE: Americans are divided on decorating for Christmas before or after Thanksgiving
SUMMARY: Americans across the U.S. are divided on whether or not decorating for Christmas before Thanksgiving is too early. Some put up holiday furnishings the day after Halloween.

TITLE: Hanukkah is celebrated with traditions of lighting the menorah, spinning the dreidel and eating a festive meal
SUMMARY: Hanukkah is celebrated by Jewish people around the world. The eight-night celebration is marked with many traditions, including the most popular lighting of the menorah.

TITLE: 5 things to know about MLK Jr. and the legacy of the civil rights icon
SUMMARY: Dive into the legacy of Martin Luther King Jr., a pivotal figure in the civil rights movement. Explore his journey, from challenging segregation to advocating for justice and equality.

TITLE: 10 interesting facts you may not know about Martin Luther King Jr.
SUMMARY: Martin Luther King Jr. had a strong impact on the country throughout his life and long after. He tirelessly fought for equality and social justice through peaceful methods.
